channel.title: Need help making ipban option

item.title: Need help making ipban option
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

if(playerRights == 3) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("ipban"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

ok i made it so if you have owner status you can click ipban on people i also have a ipban commandâ€¦what now?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2007, 01:44:55 AM[/size][hr]please?
